segments.text: Good morning , Madam . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I â€™ Ve come to inquire about a 6,000- dollar remittance from California . Has it arrived ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Wait for a moment please . I am sorry , Mrs . Clinton , but the remittance doesn't appear to have arrived yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? It should have arrived . It was sent a week ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If the money was sent by cable , it would have taken about one or two days . But if it was sent by airmail , it would take at least one week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , then I'll come again the day after tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Or would you like us to phone you when the money arrives ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be very kind of you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you please tell me your phone number , so we'll give you a ring as soon as the remittance has arrived ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . We'll inform you in time . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S1
